lead_paragraph: Treasury Secretary Jacob J. Lew, en route to a G-7 meeting in Germany, cited “broad uncertainties for Europe and the global economy.”

headline.print_headline: U.S. Asks Europe to Solve Greek Debt Crisis Quickly
headline.main: U.S. Urges European Leaders to Solve Greek Crisis Quickly

snippet: Treasury Secretary Jacob J. Lew, en route to a G-7 meeting in Germany, cited “broad uncertainties for Europe and the global economy.”
abstract: Treasury Sec Jacob J Lew presses Europe's leaders to fix fiscal woes in Greece before situation starts to bruise global economy.
